CodeExample.Title: Call the Message/ReplyAll action
CodeExample.Summary: To call the Message/ReplyAll action,submit a POST request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request:
POST /<version>/myOrganization/users/<User.objectId>/Messages/<Message.Id>/ReplyAll HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose Content-Length : <body_length>
{ Comment : <Edm.String> }

Remarks.string: A successful call to the Message/ReplyAll action returns an empty response.
